headerDisplay: This plugin provides Homebridge support for Eufy Security devices, including the E340 doorbell with improved Node.js 24.9.0+ compatibility.

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as it will appear in Homebridge logs.

country.title: Country
country.description: Your country code (e.g., US, GB, DE).

enableEmbeddedPKCS1Support.title: Enable Embedded PKCS1 Support
enableEmbeddedPKCS1Support.description: Enable software-based PKCS1 support for Node.js versions that don't have native support. Node.js 24.9.0+ with OpenSSL 3.5.2+ has restored native support and doesn't need this.

pollingIntervalMinutes.title: Polling Interval (minutes)
pollingIntervalMinutes.description: How often to poll for device status updates.

CameraMaxLivestreamDuration.title: Camera Max Livestream Duration (seconds)
CameraMaxLivestreamDuration.description: Maximum duration for camera livestreams in seconds.
